sen.j: 吉見公子（よしみ きみこ）は、日本の水墨画家。
sen.e: Kimiko YOSHIMI is a Japanese painter of suibokuga (ink-wash painting).
Kimiko YOSHIMI is a Japanese painter of suibokuga (ink-wash painting).
Kimiko YOSHIMI is a Japanese painter of suibokuga (ink-wash painting).
She hailed from Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
She is from Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
She is from Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 現在は東京と千葉を中心に活動中。
sen.e: She is working mainly in Tokyo and Chiba at present.
She is currently working mainly in Tokyo and Chiba.
sen.cmt: よりスムースに修正しました。
sen.e: She is currently working mainly in Tokyo and Chiba.

sen.j: 現代水墨画グループ「カオス会」にて活動。
sen.e: She is working as a member of "Kaosu-kai", a group of contemporary suibokuga painters.
She is a part of 'the Chaotic Association,' a group of contemporary suibokuga painters.
sen.cmt: working as a member→a part,「カオス会」、カンマの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: She is a part of 'the Chaotic Association,' a group of contemporary suibokuga painters.
